title: Muthoot or Manapurram: Which one's a better play on rising gold prices? - Economic Times
content: Muthoot or Manapurram: Which one's a better play on rising gold prices?  Economic Times
description: When there is a war, the stock market becomes extremely volatile. Investors withdraw funds from the market and place them in more stable asset classes. Manappuram Finance and Muthoot Finance are two listed companies whose primary business is lending against gold. Has the crisis helped them?
